action_item: Topics - Walk through the NextGen system for dental data entry.
notes: Focus on where to input patient information and address pain points related to dental work.

action_item: Requirements - Address the wait list functionality in NextGen.
notes: Determine if wait list patients should be considered as patients in NextGen.

action_item: Requirements - Show where to input family size and income information in NextGen.
notes: Demonstrate the sliding fee schedule verification process.

action_item: Interface - Explore the integration of document management with external systems.
notes: Investigate how to share documents from NextGen without manual copying.

action_item: Key Question - Determine if DrCloud can track referrals and services provided by external partners.
notes: Assess the current capabilities and potential solutions for tracking referrals.

action_item: Reports - Investigate the capability to send alerts to patients on the wait list for available appointments.
notes: Explore how to implement a notification system for patients regarding appointment availability.

action_item: Users & Roles - Review the sliding fee scale modifications in NextGen.
notes: Clarify if modifications were made to the sliding fee scale feature in NextGen.

action_item: Service Codes - Look into the patient survey capabilities within DrCloud.
notes: Determine if the current package includes functionality for patient surveys.
